context: Spotify reached 600M+ monthly users and achieved profitability. The company is the global leader in music and podcasts, expanding into audiobooks and AI-powered features.

competitors.name: Apple Music
competitors.notes: Second-largest music streaming with Apple ecosystem integration

competitors.name: Amazon Music
competitors.notes: Growing streaming tied to Prime and Alexa

competitors.name: YouTube Music
competitors.notes: Google streaming with YouTube Premium bundle
